statements: SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers WHERE research_field = 'Genomics';
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers WHERE drug_targets_found IS NOT NULL;
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE research_field = 'Bioinformatics' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, drug_targets_found FROM researchers WHERE genomics_data->>'ssc_number' = '12345';
SELECT researcher_name, research_field, genomics_data FROM researchers WHERE research_field LIKE '%genomics%' AND genomics_data->>'cancer_type' = 'Lung Cancer';
SELECT researcher_name, research_field, jsonb_array_elements_text(drug_targets_found) AS target FROM researchers WHERE drug_targets_found @> '[{"target_name": "GeneX"}]';
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, genomics_data FROM GenomicsData WHERE data_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(data_id), MIN(data_id) FROM GenomicsData;
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, genomics_data FROM Researchers JOIN GenomicsData ON Researchers.researcher_id = GenomicsData.researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%D%';
SELECT * FROM researcher_research;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM researcher_research;
SELECT data_id, researcher_id, data_type, data_content FROM genomics_data WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, target_name FROM drug_targets WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS total_targets FROM drug_targets GROUP BY researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM researcher_research ORDER BY researcher_id ASC;
SELECT data_content, data_type FROM genomics_data WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT target_name, gene_name FROM drug_targets WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name AS Name, researcher_id AS ID FROM researcher_research WHERE researcher_id > 3;
SELECT data_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM genomics_data GROUP BY data_type HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT data_id, dna_sequence FROM GenomicsData WHERE rna_expression > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM DrugTargets WHERE action_mechanism IS NOT NULL ORDER BY target_id ASC;
SELECT drug_name, target_name FROM BiopharmaceuticalDevelopment JOIN DrugTargets ON BiopharmaceuticalDevelopment.target_id = DrugTargets.target_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University of ABC';
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Researchers WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM GenomicsData WHERE rna_expression > 50;
SELECT target_name, target_gene FROM DrugTargets ORDER BY target_gene DESC;
SELECT Researchers.name, DrugTargets.target_name FROM Researchers INNER JOIN BiopharmaceuticalDevelopment ON Researchers.researcher_id = BiopharmaceuticalDevelopment.target_id;
SELECT * FROM researcher;
SELECT name, email FROM researcher WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data FROM genomics_data WHERE researcher_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT target_name FROM drug_targets WHERE genomics_data_id = 3 LIMIT 5;
SELECT drug_name, target_id FROM biopharmaceuticals WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM researcher WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM researcher ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, result FROM biopharmaceuticals JOIN analysis_results ON biopharmaceuticals.id = analysis_results.result_id;
SELECT target_name FROM drug_targets WHERE genomics_data_id IN (SELECT id FROM genomics_data WHERE researcher_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
